Double Punch/Ramhorn/Injector/Manterror:

Double Punch checked his scanners.  Weapons fire.  Scanning the area, he 
detected four signatures.  One Pred, one unknown, two Maximal.  <Manterror, 
Injector, go to these coordinates (he told them the coordinates), assist 
Mosquitor.  Kill all Maximals>

----

Injector and Manterror confirmed with Double Punch, heading for the 
coordinates they had been given.

============

Ramhorn went up to the bridge of the Ark.  Opening a com, he responded to 
Beachcomber.  <Hey, Ramhorn here.  You have clearance to go inside, I->, he 
went wide opticed (if that's even a real word), seeing gunfire on the 
scanners, <someone else will have to show you around.> he said, ending the 
comlink, running down towards a hatch to leave the Ark.

----

Beachcomber slammed himself against a metal wall, watching Ramhorn run by, 
sub-machine gun raised.  "Ok..." he said slowly, walking into the Ark calling 
out to anyone.  "Hello!  I need some quarters?  Anyone else here?!"
